smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.
Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function provideTicksFetcher has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function provideTickBeerFetcher has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function provideFetcherManager has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function provideBeerActions has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'FetcherModule' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'RateBeerService' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Class 'BeerDetailsView' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BeerDetailsViewModel' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BeerDetailsActivity' with '13' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BeerListFragment' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'BrewerListFragment' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ListActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'DataModule' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'StoreModule' with '12' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'ReviewActionsImpl' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Interface 'FragmentComponent' with '19' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'
Interface 'ActivityComponent' with '17' functions detected. Defined threshold inside interfaces is set to '11'

smells.name: ComplexInterface
smells.description: An interface contains too many functions and properties. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. An interface should have one responsibility. Split up large interfaces into smaller ones that are easier to understand.

instances.message: The interface RateBeerService is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface FragmentComponent is too complex. Consider splitting it up.
The interface ActivityComponent is too complex. Consider splitting it up.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: MethodOverloading
smells.description: Methods which are overloaded often might be harder to maintain. Furthermore, these methods are tightly coupled. Refactor these methods and try to use optional parameters.

instances.message: This method is overloaded too many times.
This method is overloaded too many times.
This method is overloaded too many times.
This method is overloaded too many times.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function initialize appears to be too complex.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionThrown
smells.description: Thrown exception is too generic. Prefer throwing project specific exceptions to handle error cases.

instances.message: Exception is a too generic Exception. Prefer throwing specific exceptions that indicate a specific error case.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: VariableNaming
smells.description: Variable names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Variable names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private variable names should match the pattern: (_)?[a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: ObjectPropertyNaming
smells.description: Property names inside objects should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private object property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: FunctionNaming
smells.description: Function names should follow the naming convention set in the configuration.

instances.message: Function names should match the pattern: ^([a-z$][a-zA-Z$0-9]*)|(`.*`)$

smells.name: TopLevelPropertyNaming
smells.description: Top level property names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Private top level property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*
Private top level property names should match the pattern: (_)?[A-Za-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: MemberNameEqualsClassName
smells.description: A member should not given the same name as its parent class or object.

instances.message: A member is named after the class object. This might result in confusion. Please rename the member.

A member is named after the class object. This might result in confusion. Please rename the member.

smells.name: ConstructorParameterNaming
smells.description: Constructor parameter names should follow the naming convention set in the projects configuration.

instances.message: Constructor parameter names should match the pattern: [a-z][A-Za-z0-9]*

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: CODE_CAPTURE_BARCODE can be a `const val`.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message:
Parentheses in (review.userName +
            (if (review.country != null) ", " + review.country else "") +
            "\n" + review.timeEntered.formatDate()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: review.userName +
            (if (review.country != null) ", " + review.country else "") +
            "\n" + review.timeEntered.formatDate()

smells.name: PreferToOverPairSyntax
smells.description: Pair was created using the Pair constructor, using the to syntax is preferred.

instances.message: Pair is created by using the pair constructor. This can replaced by `username to password`

smells.name: FunctionOnlyReturningConstant
smells.description: A function that only returns a constant is misleading. Consider declaring a constant instead

instances.message: singleResultShouldOpenDetails is returning a constant. Prefer declaring a constant instead.

smells.name: TrailingWhitespace
smells.description: Checks which lines end with a whitespace.

instances.message: Line 53 ends with a whitespace.

smells.name: DataClassContainsFunctions
smells.description: Data classes should mainly be used to store data and should not have any extra functions. (Compiler will automatically generate equals, toString and hashCode functions)

instances.message: The data class Brewer contains functions which are not registered conversion functions. The offending method is called hasDetails

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class Header defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
